cause.description:
Our goal is to protect a woman's right to choose what happens to her own body. This includes the right to an abortion if she so chooses.
We believe that choice is a precious and beautiful right, and should be guarded.
1. Abortion should be legal.
2. Roe v. Wade should be protected.
3. A woman's body is her own business, not the government's.
4. Birth control should be readily available to all women.
cause.mission: To stop the assault on choice and protect a woman's rights over her own body.
cause.name: Protect a Woman's Right to Choose
